last_assistant_message:
## Task Complete

**Task**: Write Tests & Implement L&D (MS-09) & Recruitment (MS-10)
**Status**: Completed

**What was done**:
- Created L&D Service (MS-09) at `src/services/lnd-service/` with Course, Enrollment, and TrainingRecord modules including Kirkpatrick 4-level evaluation
- Created Recruitment & Onboarding Service (MS-10) at `src/services/recruitment-onboarding/` with JobPosting, Candidate, Onboarding, and Resignation modules
- Full resignation workflow: submit → manager approve → HR approve → clearance → settlement
- Wrote and passed 82 unit tests total (36 L&D + 46 Recruitment)

**Files changed**:
- `src/services/lnd-service/` — 18 files (config, prisma, 3 modules with service/controller/module, 3 test files)
- `src/services/recruitment-onboarding/` — 22 files (config, prisma, 4 modules with service/controller/module, 4 test files)

**Verification**: All 82 tests passing across both services
